mean_cn: n.一连串；系列，系列节目；连续比赛
mean_en: several events or things of a similar kind that happen one after the other; a set of radio or television programmes that deal with the same subject or that have the same characters
sentence: A series of coinciding incidents resulted in the glass-breaking.
sentence_trans: 一连串巧合的事件导致玻璃被打碎。
